channel.title: ice on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in ice on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-30
item.description: Future autonomous Waymo EV will be custom built for ride-hailing with no steering wheel (2 minute read) Waymo is collaborating with Geely, a Chinese automotive company, to create an EV for its US ride-hailing service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-01
item.description: Facebook’s Meta watch has a camera notch, according to first leaked image (2 minute read) Leaked images of Facebook’s smartwatch show a camera notch that is clearly visible when the watch’s screen is off.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-23
item.description: Brave’s nontracking search engine is now in beta (8 minute read) Brave’s search engine has been launched in global beta.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-11
item.description: SpaceX reveals plans for a Texas spaceport resort in new job ad (2 minute read) SpaceX has posted a job for a ‘Resort Development Manager’ to be based out of Brownsville, a town near its Boca Chica test and development site.
